entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
